long_description: Use the Scarpa Vibram(R) Mountain Plus soles to make your Scarpa Freedom randonee boots (sold separately) compatible with Dynafit-style tech bindings. Vibram Mountain Plus soles replace the Vibram(R) Mountain Piste soles on your Scarpa Freedom randonee boots. Lugs offer good traction when you're scrambling across rocks.
short_description: Use the Scarpa Vibram(R) Mountain Plus soles to make your Scarpa Freedom randonee boots (sold separately) compatible with Dynafit-style tech bindings.
